short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly capture HTML, CSS, and screenshots from any website to recreate cool UI components using large language models.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WebToLLM is an innovative Chrome extension designed to streamline the process of capturing, analyzing, and exporting web page elements. Whether you are a developer, designer, or researcher, WebToLLM provides you with the tools needed to extract and manipulate HTML, CSS, and screenshots of web elements efficiently. This extension bridges the gap between manual inspection and automated extraction, making it easier to gather the data you need for various applications, including machine learning, web development, and UI/UX design.
